message.content: This question requires knowledge about environmental pollution and the impact of certain actions on the environment. Option (B) is the correct answer because throwing plastic in the Pacific would contribute to pollution in the ocean. Plastic pollution is a major issue that affects marine life and the health of our oceans. Option (A) is incorrect because using solar panels on the house actually helps reduce pollution by using clean and renewable energy. Option (C) is incorrect because using plastic to make raincoats does not directly contribute to pollution, although the production and disposal of the raincoats could have environmental impacts. Option (D) is unrelated to pollution as it refers to repurposing glass bottles, which would actually be a more environmentally friendly practice.

This question requires knowledge about different ways in which pollution can occur. Option (B) is correct because throwing plastic in the Pacific would contribute to pollution in the ocean. Plastic pollution is a serious environmental issue, and the Pacific Ocean has been greatly affected by plastic waste. Option (A) is incorrect because using solar panels on the house is a way to reduce pollution and reliance on non-renewable energy sources. Option (C) is incorrect because using plastic to make raincoats does not contribute directly to pollution, though the production and disposal of plastic raincoats can have environmental impacts. Option (D) is incorrect because using glass bottles to make a house does not contribute to pollution. It may actually be a form of recycling or repurposing waste materials.

This question requires knowledge about pollution and its causes. Option (B) is the correct answer because throwing plastic in the Pacific is a form of pollution. Options (A), (C), and (D) are incorrect because they involve the use of materials (solar panels, plastic, and glass bottles) that do not directly contribute to pollution.

Option (D) is incorrect because using glass bottles to make a house is a form of recycling and does not cause pollution.
